user.title: OpenRouter API Configuration
user.description: Enter your OpenRouter API key. You can get one at {docs_url}

model.title: Model Configuration
model.description:
Select any OpenRouter model. You can enter a custom model ID or choose from suggestions.

Provider selection will be shown in the next step based on available endpoints for your chosen model.

provider.title: Provider Selection
provider.description:
Select a provider for **{model}**.

Found **{provider_count}** providers offering this model. Providers are sorted by price (cheapest first).

**Prompt Caching:** For caching, select a specific provider (not 'auto'). See [OpenRouter docs]({caching_docs_url}).

data_description.provider: Choose 'Automatic' for best price, or select a specific provider for guaranteed routing.

data.enable_quick_actions: Enable quick actions (bypass LLM for simple commands)
data.enable_prompt_caching: Enable prompt caching (reduces latency and cost)

prompt.title: Prompt Configuration
prompt.description: Customize the assistant's personality and behavior

error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key. Please check and try again.

init.title: Smart Assist Settings
init.description:
Adjust your Smart Assist configuration.

**Provider:** Shows providers available for your current model. If you change the model, reconfigure the integration to see updated providers.

**Prompt Caching:** Requires a specific provider (not 'auto') and a supported model.

data_description.provider: Providers available for your current model. For prompt caching, select a specific provider.
data_description.enable_prompt_caching: Reduces latency and cost. Requires supported model + specific provider.
